response.overview: Basically, it was a simple plan: in, out, and live carefree until the end of your life. But once again, someone is too greedy and things happen as they happen. Gordon Bellisario has to reconstruct what happened on that day and why the alleged counterfeiters were able to escape with the loot. But the interrogation is anything but pleasant, because -Black- was not only sent to get information.
response.title: Hitmans Revolution
